SELECT c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, COUNT(uc.id) as used_count, SUM(uc.order_amount) as total_order_amount, SUM(uc.discount_amount) as total_discount_amount FROM coupon c JOIN user_coupon uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id WHERE uc.use_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND uc.status = 2 -- 假设2表示已使用 GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value ORDER BY used_count DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, c.min_amount, COUNT(uc.id) as receive_count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN uc.status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as used_count, ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN uc.status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(uc.id), 0), 2) as use_rate FROM coupon c JOIN user_coupon uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, c.min_amount ORDER BY receive_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
